channel.title: Omfg omfg plz help omfg plzzzzzzz some hacker dude help!
channel.description: theres this guy on my server called i revo i and he wotn stfu he keeps calling my mods who*$s and stuff and i iup banned him how did he still get on and he is thretning to put my server down for 3 weeks and he said something like mod bot or bot mod or bot crash or soemthign bot that crashes server how do i get ride of him plz helkp help help!!!!!!!!!!!!! no!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! i spent to much time on my server i did make backup copy of server files on my computer should i shut all of my open ports or what help!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

item.title: Omfg omfg plz help omfg plzzzzzzz some hacker dude help!
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

First, dude, calm down.
Second, if he won’t leave your server alone (apparently for 3 weeks), just delete your server IP, and get a new one.

Or, just ban him every time he logs in, because, he’s using proxies.

But dude, seriously, calm down. And if he’s spamming, using the yell, disable it for normal players, have it set only for mod+, or just mute the guy, and he won’t even notice he’s muted… and he’ll just sit there… spamming himself.

EDIT: And, it’s very doubtingly, that he is a ‘Hacker’ If he can so called ‘Hack’ ask him to show you his so called ‘Hacks.’

EDIT EDIT: And dude, he can’t do anything to your server…

Read full topic

item.title: Omfg omfg plz help omfg plzzzzzzz some hacker dude help!
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

ok
well llets say in your ipbaning method
probably like

public void ipBan(String addess) { if(connectingAddress = addres) { disconnect = true; } }

and other stuff like that
instead of having disconnet = true; and other banning things youd close the soccket like in the above method
so basicly replace all the banning stuff in there with closeClient();

example:

public void ipBan(String addess) { if(connectingAddress = addres) { closeClient(); } }

http://java.sun.com/javase/6/docs/api/java/net/Socket.html

  • abysal demon

Read full topic

item.title: Omfg omfg plz help omfg plzzzzzzz some hacker dude help!
item.dc:creator: @k0_you_scape k0 you scape
item.description:
@k0_you_scape wrote:

He’s faking bro…don’t worry about it. And if he starts spamming, Just turn the server off for like 5 minutes. He’ll go away. And if he doesn’t…TRy going to his character file copy his ip, and paste it in data, banned ip’s and save it. But before you save it, make sure he’s offline or it won’t work. I hope this helped bye

item.title: Omfg omfg plz help omfg plzzzzzzz some hacker dude help!
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

close the socket using java.net

[code] public void closeClient() {
try {
java.net.Socket s = Server.ClientListener.accept();

        logout();
        disconnected = true;
        this.destruct();
        s.close();
    } catch (IOException ioe) {}
}[/code]

Failing that, give me your server IP and I’ll come have a word with him, I can be very ‘persuasive’

Hope I have/can help

Wetton

@uber_leet wrote:

Yeah, be wary just in case, and keep banning him. He is probably using an IP changer, which sucks, but he’s probably lieing about being able to take down your server.

I would make backup copys of all your files just in case, he’ll soon get bored and leave your server.

Hope thats helped,

Wetton
